definitions.definition: Any material used to cover the top layer of soil to protect, insulate, or decorate it, or to discourage weeds or retain moisture.
definitions.example: An organic mulch is a mulch made of natural substances such as leaves or grass clippings.

definitions.definition: A material used as mulch, as a decorative redwood bark mulch.

definitions.example: Mulch your vegetable garden to retain moisture and keep weeds down.
I decided to mulch the grass clippings.
